title: You can see everyone worked hard for this film!
review: It takes more than just great actors to make a successful film, so for the people behind the curtains making everything even more awesome, I want to give my thanks for providing us with this masterpiece of a film!

title: Great work yet again!
review: Alfred Molina delivered a top performance in this film! Even with the short screen time, he made such a great impact on the overall quality of the movie.

title: This would have been great
review: If only they could've done a better job with Spider Man 3. It would've been up there together with Matrix as one of the few trilogies that didn't suck.

title: Nice work making it more kid-friendly Marvel
review: If my kids love it, then I love it too. I actually like this kind of Thor more as he is much more kid-friendly.

title: Perfect animation!
review: Oh wow. I am blown away. How on Earth did an animated film such as this do so well? And how were they able to take all these separate characters and give them so much development without the film feeling like it was dragging.

title: What a shame
review: Some of the scenes were unnecessary and could've been just cut out entirely and the movie would still make sense. I expected more from this 3-hour film but it turned out to be just a complete waste of time

title: Probably the worst Avengers film
review: Don't be brainwashed. This is just a remix of the first Avengers movie. Nothing new here except for the new heroes but plot-wise it's pretty much the same thing.

title: Well-written script
review: I appreciate very much how they wrote the script, especially the ones for the denizens of Asgard. Well-spoken without being too clunky as Old English would sound.

title: Really bad sequel
review: It would've been better if they gave us more information about the bad guy. Sure he's just another villain but a back story would've still been great.
